question: Show me all diplomas and certificates that require passing an exam.
sql_query1:
SELECT Courses.Title 
FROM Courses
WHERE (Courses.AwardProgram = "Diploma" OR Courses.AwardProgram = "Certificate") AND Courses.CompletionRequirements = "Passing Exam"
sql_query2:
SELECT Courses.Title 
FROM Courses
WHERE Courses.AwardProgram = "Diploma" OR Courses.AwardProgram = "Certificate" AND Courses.CompletionRequirements = "Passing Exam"
interpretation1: Which diplomas require passing an exam and which certificates have the same requirements?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all diplomas and also provide a list of certificates that require passing an exam.
